name: Atomic Age They Invade Us
description:
There is a alien invation in a laboratory of biological experiments, the bugs have come back to life again, they want to destroy everything and only you can stop them. Immerse yourself in this great adventure and help the first Bug Hunter to stop these hateful bugs. but be careful, they are not friendly at all...

You can play adventure mode where you will find different enemies that will make your step, you can also play extreme survival mode where the number of enemies will be ridiculously high, and if that was not enough, you can create your own levels and share them with your friends.
